name: piping-ssh-web
description: SSH over HTTPS via Piping Server

scripts.serve: npm run patch-golang-crypto && concurrently -r 'vue-cli-service serve' 'npm run build-wasm-watch'
scripts.build-wasm: (cd go && GOOS=js GOARCH=wasm go build -o ../public/main.wasm) && cp "$(go env GOROOT)/misc/wasm/wasm_exec.js" ./public
scripts.build: npm run patch-golang-crypto && npm run build-wasm && vue-cli-service build
